title: michael2019
author: michael2019
content: Hello!I work as a Chinese Translator and have been working with some crypto projects so far.I am located in China and can speak English well.And also familiar with crypto.China has big market and opportunities for crypto curremcy.So I welcome every new oportunity to cooperate.What I usually offer :1. Translation ( I can provide you multiple languages' translation service as I have a group that many professional translators share info)2. Group management(same as above)3. MarketingWe can help you post topics or article in the Chinese search engines or web as you directed,for example baidu,bihu etcPost article on Weibo or twitter KOL who has many followers which are in crypto area3.International trade business(global trade business).We have been in this area for 7 years and can produce or source the goods that you need in China.The services I offer include but are not limited to the above, and the recommended services vary from project to project.If you are interested, please pm me on telegram - @kelvincarter002we can talk further on how to get started with Chinese marketing.Thank you.
